dct_title_s: Map of the State of New York
dct_description_sm: Shows principal cities and towns, railroads, canals, and major natural features as well as adjacent portions of neighboring states and provinces.; Prime meridian: Washington, D. C.; Relief shown by hachures.; Map within decorative border.; Insets: [View of] Niagara Falls -- [Map of Long Island].
45 x 56 centimeters, on sheet 54 x 64 centimeters
dct_publisher_sm: Charles Magnus (12 Frankfort Str.,  New York)
